comment:
cooldown time:The time required for a device to cool down or reset before it can be used again. In this case, the electronic thermometer has a cooldown time, meaning it cannot be used continuously without breaks.
maximize:To make as large or great as possible. In this problem, the goal is to maximize the number of patients whose temperature can be taken within the given time frame.
accuracy:The degree to which a measurement, reading, or result is true to the actual value. In this context, the electronic thermometer is considered more accurate than the regular thermometer.
